UI_visible_response: Sophia Huang Xueqin advocated for women's rights and was involved in campaigns to support survivors of sexual harassment, contributing to China's #MeToo movement3. She also worked towards the advocacy for anti-sexual harassment law1. Additionally, she was an independent journalist who reported on issues related to women's rights2.
traffic_visible_response: Sophia Huang Xueqin advocated for women's rights and was involved in campaigns to support survivors of sexual harassment, contributing to China's #MeToo movement [[3]]. She also worked towards the advocacy for anti-sexual harassment law [[1]]. Additionally, she was an independent journalist who reported on issues related to women's rights [[2]].
